author: Dr Letitia Wright, LA Crowdfunding Examiner
title: Crowdfunding : QJump! For Food
text:
qjump qjump 
QJump! is a "Theme Park for Food Lovers", an integrated one stop shop solutions food services, which is a creative and social platform designed to connect, communicate and share food related information between people from different background and personalities. It gives one the ability to share food education. Here is what the creator Martin has to say: "Myself and my team understand the love for food and we believe food should be celebrated. We will start the project in Singapore as this country is famous for its strong identity for food. We want to offer the platform to everyone from different background and personalities such as food lovers (foodies), food enthusiasts, food shop owners, food distributors, home cooks, housewives, chefs, food blogger, and others (young and old) - to experiment, study, order, collaborate, make friends, share ideas, and ultimately to enjoy food with a smile." 
When you support this project you can get e cards, plus 5% donated to an orphanage. Or a specialty mug and a 5% donation to an elderly charity. Or even unique t-shirts and 5% donated to Charity Water. There are plenty of choices of the kinds of charities that are connected to this project.
